name: BrivoSmartHome
0:
”Alexa, lock the Front Door.”
”Alexa, turn on the Bedroom Light.”
”Alexa, set the Bedroom Light to twenty percent.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Brivo Smart Home Skill for Amazon Alexa allows you to control smart home devices that are connected to a Brivo Gateway. 
To get started, tap “Enable to use” in the Alexa app, and sign into the Brivo Smart Home portal that you want to link to your Alexa skills account. After Brivo Smart Home is linked to your Alexa skills account, ensure that the Brivo Smart Home compatible devices connected to your Brivo Gateway are also added to your Alexa devices list. 
Once set up, you can turn on and off lights, lock doors, set the brightness on dimmers and control the temperature on thermostats for remote management and touchfree interactions.
